title: OS X El Capitan Won't Install! Why? - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: OS X El Capitan Won't Install! Why? - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: OS X El Capitan won't install on these two MacBook Pros (8,1). Why? Let's find out!  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?
